title: Manappuram Finance slips 10%, hits 52-week low on weak Q3 results - Business Standard
content:
1. Manappuram Finance slips 10%, hits 52-week low on weak Q3 results  Business Standard
  2. Manappuram Finance Q3 Results: Net profit falls 46% to Rs 261 crore  Economic Times
  3. Manappuram Fin Q3 profit falls 46% to Rs 261 crore  The Financial Express
  4. Manappuram Finance Q3 net profit post 46 per cent drop  BusinessLine
  5. Manappuram Finance shares hit 52-week low after consolidated net profit drops by 46% in q3fy22  Zee Business
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The company reported 46 per cent year-on-year drop in its consolidated net profit at Rs 261 crore in December quarter (Q3FY22)
